name: Utility Qualities
description: Utility and specialized qualities for all Digimon

qualities.name: SYSTEM BOOST
qualities.description:
When the Digimon purchases a **Rank** in this Quality, it chooses one of its **Derived Stats** (**RAM**, **CPU**, **BIT**, **DOS**). It gains +1 to its choice. A Digimon cannot choose the same **Derived Stat** twice.

The number of **Ranks** in this Quality a Digimon can purchase is equal to its **Stage**, to a maximum of 4.

qualities.name: TELEPORT
qualities.description:
The Digimon is capable of instantly teleporting a number of **Spaces** equal to its **Stage** + 2. It requires line of sight.

The Digimon also adds its **Ranks** in **INSTINCT** to the distance, as well as an additional +1 if it has **DATA OPT: SPEEDSTER**.

It may use this Quality to teleport away as an **Interrupt Action** to an Enemy's **Attack Once per Combat**, causing the **Attack** to miss. Alternatively, this **Once per Combat** use can be used as a **Clash Action** to automatically escape the **Clash**.

qualities.name: GLAMOR
qualities.description:
Incompatible: **ILLUSIONARY OVERLAY**
The Digimon is capable of applying a Glamor to their allies, allowing them to have a different appearance. This can affect any number of targets within a number of **Spaces** equal to half the Digimon's **BIT**, performed as 2 **Actions**.

The illusion remains until specific conditions are met.

qualities.name: ILLUSIONARY OVERLAY
qualities.description:
Incompatible: **GLAMOR**
Requirement: **NATUREWALK QUALITY**

The Digimon is capable of overlaying illusions in reality using their elemental abilities, manipulating the environment's appearance within a radius of its **BIT**, performed as 2 **Actions**.

The Digimon must choose one effect: Illusionary Shroud or Illusionary Barriers.

The illusion remains until specific conditions are met.

qualities.name: TECHNICIAN
qualities.description:
The Digimon is skilled at repairing code and technology, and can read and comprehend Digicode for its Tamer.

It gains a +3 bonus to **Skill Checks** involving repairing/deciphering code and machinery, understanding environments, and rebuilding things in the Digital World.

qualities.name: FIREWALL
qualities.description:
Requirement: **TECHNICIAN**
The Digimon increases the bonus provided by **TECHNICIAN** by +3, and can now also add their **TECHNICIAN** bonus to routing out intruders, protecting/reinforcing code, maintaining **Domain Control**, and resisting code manipulation effects.

qualities.name: TROJAN
qualities.description:
Requirement: **TECHNICIAN**
The Digimon increases the bonus provided by **TECHNICIAN** by +3, and can now also add their **TECHNICIAN** bonus to manipulating code to access protected areas, and damaging/corrupting code and machinery.
